title: Late July Snacks' Dawes on Growth of Organic Snack Food (Audio)
itunes:title: Late July Snacks' Dawes on Growth of Organic Snack Food (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Nicole Bernard Dawes, CEO of Late July Snacks, on starting the company, and the massive growth of the organic, non-GMO snack food sector.
